Name: Daughter of the Oak
Phase26Description: I met a druid named Albard, the keeper of Vasily’s Tree. He says the tree is ill and needs a piece of the Great Oak, taken from the Underroot beneath Túr Dúlra. Who knows what I will find down there.
Phase5Description: I went to the Underroot and took a cutting from the Great Oak. I should bring it to Keeper Albard and see if he can heal Vasily's Tree.
Toast: Vasily's Tree is weakening and needs help.
